summary: This document is an Amendment Agreement between Deutsche Bank AG and Southern Financial, LLC, which outlines changes to their existing ISDA Master Agreement. Key amendments include adjustments to ownership requirements and financial thresholds related to Southern Financial's net worth and assets, as well as provisions regarding the resolution stay protocol.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as a significant owner of Southern Financial, LLC, with a requirement to maintain at least 51% ownership.

persons.name: Sebastian Marcilese
persons.context: Sebastian Marcilese is identified as the Vice President of Deutsche Bank AG, who executed the Amendment Agreement.

keyFacts: The Amendment Agreement is dated October 23, 2017.
Jeffrey Epstein must maintain at least 51% ownership of Southern Financial, LLC.
Southern Financial, LLC's net worth must not fall below USD 120,000,000.
The Amendment Agreement voids a previous Termination Agreement from December 7, 2016.
Sebastian Marcilese is the Vice President of Deutsche Bank AG who signed the agreement.
